bundle.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [lightgray]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[lightgray]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings. Note that public networks sometimes do not allow server discovery.
bundle.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[lightgray]Note: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build Titan units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
bundle.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear this data?\nWhat is done cannot be undone!
bundle.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNING![]\nThis will clear all data, including saves, maps, unlocks and keybinds.\nOnce you press 'ok' the game will wipe all data and automatically exit.

bundle.properties.tutorial.intro:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Use[accent] [[WASD][] to move.
[accent]Scroll[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
You have entered the[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Swipe the screen to move.
[accent]Pinch with 2 fingers[] to zoom in and out.
Begin by[accent] mining copper[]. Move close to it, then tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.

[accent]{0}/{1} copper
bundle.properties.tutorial.drill:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Click the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[]. Place it on a copper vein by clicking.
You can also select the drill by tapping [accent][[2][] then [accent][[1][] quickly, regardless of which tab is open.
[accent]Right-click[] to stop building.
bundle.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Mining manually is inefficient.
[accent]Drills[] can mine automatically.
Tap the drill tab in the bottom right.
Select the[accent] mechanical drill[].
Place it on a copper vein by tapping, then press the[accent] checkmark[] below to confirm your selection.
Press the[accent] X button[] to cancel placement.
bundle.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Each block has different stats. Each drill can only mine certain ores.
To check a block's info and stats,[accent] tap the "?" button while selecting it in the build menu.[]

[accent]Access the Mechanical Drill's stats now.[]
bundle.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent]Hold down the mouse to place in a line.[]
Hold[accent] CTRL[] while selecting a line to place diagonally.
Use the scrollwheel to rotate blocks before placing them.
[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.
Make a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
[accent] Place in a line by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[accent]Place 2 conveyors with the line tool, then deliver an item into the core.
bundle.properties.tutorial.turret:
Once an item enters your core, it can be used for building.
Keep in mind that not all items can be used for building.
Items that are not used for building, such as[accent] coal[] or[accent] scrap[], cannot be put into the core.
Defensive structures must be built to repel the[lightgray] enemy[].
Build a[accent] duo turret[] near your base.
bundle.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo[] to shoot.
Place a drill near the turret.
Lead conveyors into the turret to supply it with copper.

[accent]Ammo delivered: 0/1
bundle.properties.tutorial.pause:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press space to pause.
bundle.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle.properties.tutorial.unpause: Now press space again to unpause.
bundle.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Now press it again to unpause.
bundle.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Hold down right-click[] to destroy all blocks in a selection.[]

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Blocks frequently need to be destroyed.
[accent]Select deconstruction mode[], then tap a block to begin breaking it.
Destroy an area by holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.
Press the checkmark button to confirm breaking.

[accent]Destroy all the scrap blocks to the left of your core using area selection.
bundle.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In some situations, taking items directly from blocks is necessary.
To do this, [accent]tap a block[] with items in it, then [accent]tap the item[] in the inventory.
Multiple items can be withdrawn by [accent]tapping and holding[].

[accent]Withdraw some copper from the core.[]
bundle.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposit items into blocks by dragging from your ship to the destination block.\n\n[accent]Deposit your copper back into the core.[]
bundle.properties.tutorial.waves:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves.[accent] Click[] to shoot.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
The[lightgray] enemy[] approaches.

Defend the core for 2 waves. Your ship will automatically fire at enemies.
Build more turrets and drills. Mine more copper.
bundle.properties.tutorial.launch:
Once you reach a specific wave, you are able to[accent] launch the core[], leaving your defenses behind and[accent] obtaining all the resources in your core.[]
These obtained resources can then be used to research new technology.

[accent]Press the launch button.
bundle.properties.item.copper.description: The most basic structural material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical components.
bundle.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle.properties.item.coal.description: Fossilized plant matter, formed long before the seeding event. Used extensively for fuel and resource production.
bundle.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor. Applications in solar panels, complex electronics and homing turret ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle.properties.item.spore-pod.description: A pod of synthetic spores, synthesized from atmospheric concentrations for industrial purposes. Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle.properties.item.blast-compound.description: An unstable compound used in bombs and explosives. Synthesized from spore pods and other volatile substances. Use as fuel is not advised.
bundle.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle.properties.liquid.water.description: The most useful liquid. Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle.properties.liquid.oil.description: A liquid used in advanced material production. Can be converted into coal as fuel, or sprayed and set on fire as a weapon.
bundle.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: An inert, non-corrosive liquid created from water and titanium. Has extremely high heat capacity. Extensively used as coolant.
bundle.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard control mech. Based on a Dagger unit, with upgraded armor and building capabilities. Has more damage output than a Dart ship.
bundle.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard control ship. Fast mining speed. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability.
bundle.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning and missiles.
bundle.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber, built for construction and destroying enemy fortifications. Reasonably well armored.
bundle.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Highly maneuverable.
bundle.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle.properties.unit.spirit.description: A modified draug drone, designed for repair instead of mining. Automatically fixes any damaged blocks in the area.
bundle.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Follows users. Assists in block construction.
bundle.properties.unit.dagger.description: The most basic ground mech. Cheap to produce. Overwhelming when used in swarms.
bundle.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced, armored ground unit. Attacks both ground and air targets. Equipped with two miniature Scorch-class flamethrowers.
bundle.properties.unit.fortress.description: A heavy artillery mech. Equipped with two modified Hail-type cannons for long-range assault on enemy structures and units.
bundle.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle.properties.unit.wraith.description: A fast, hit-and-run interceptor unit. Targets power generators.
bundle.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Rips through enemy structures, targeting critical infrastructure.
bundle.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with pure coal. Produces silicon.
bundle.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into the compound known as metaglass. Requires small amounts of power to run.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Synthesizes phase fabric from radioactive thorium and sand. Requires massive amounts of power to function.
bundle.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Combines titanium, lead, silicon and copper to produce surge alloy.
bundle.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mixes water and fine titanium powder into cryofluid. Essential for thorium reactor usage.
bundle.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Crushes and mixes clusters of spores with pyratite to produce blast compound.
bundle.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in wave turrets.
bundle.properties.block.separator.description: Separates slag into its mineral components. Outputs the cooled result.
bundle.properties.block.spore-press.description: Compresses spore pods under extreme pressure to synthesize oil.
bundle.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vaporizes any excess item or liquid it receives.
bundle.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.
bundle.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nDecent protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.phase-wall.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.
bundle.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.surge-wall.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.
bundle.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: An extremely durable defensive block.\nBuilds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.door.description: A small door. Can be opened or closed by tapping.
bundle.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door. Can be opened and closed by tapping.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle.properties.block.mend-projector.description: An upgraded version of the Mender. Repairs blocks in its vicinity.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings.\nOptionally uses phase fabric to boost range and efficiency.
bundle.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage.\nOverheats if too much damage is sustained. Optionally uses coolant to prevent overheating. Phase fabric can be used to increase shield size.
bundle.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.
bundle.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.\n\n[scarlet]Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.[]
bundle.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
bundle.properties.block.mass-driver.description: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.
bundle.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump. Pumps more liquid, but requires power.
bundle.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Moves liquids forward. Used in conjunction with pumps and other conduits.
bundle.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: An advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use for creating buffers in situations with non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle.properties.block.power-node-large.description: An advanced power node with greater range.
bundle.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power as a buffer in times of surplus energy. Outputs power in times of deficit.
bundle.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning flammable materials, such as coal.
bundle.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: An advanced combustion generator. More efficient, but requires additional water for generating steam.
bundle.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A simple, reliable generator. Uses the heat of decaying radioactive compounds to produce energy at a slow rate.
bundle.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: A significantly more efficient version of the standard solar panel.
bundle.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates significant amounts of power from thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely. Only capable of mining basic resources.
bundle.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill, capable of mining titanium. Mines at a faster pace than a mechanical drill.
bundle.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Capable of mining thorium.
bundle.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts groundwater. Used in locations with no surface water available.
bundle.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores in the atmosphere into industry-ready pods.
bundle.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power, sand and water to drill for oil.
bundle.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An unloader block can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from any nearby non-transportation block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping.
bundle.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch.
bundle.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle.properties.block.scatter.description: An essential anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized turret. Shoots streams of liquid at enemies. Automatically extinguishes fires when supplied with water.
bundle.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized anti-ground laser turret. Charges and fires powerful beams of energy.
bundle.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range electric turret. Fires arcs of electricity at enemies.
bundle.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized missile turret. Attacks both air and ground enemies. Fires homing missiles.
bundle.properties.block.salvo.description: A larger, more advanced version of the Duo turret. Fires quick salvos of bullets at the enemy.
bundle.properties.block.fuse.description: A large, close-range energy turret. Fires three piercing beams at nearby enemies.
bundle.properties.block.ripple.description: An extremely powerful artillery turret. Shoots clusters of shells at enemies over long distances.
bundle.properties.block.cyclone.description: A large anti-air and anti-ground turret. Fires explosive clumps of flak at nearby units.
bundle.properties.block.spectre.description: A massive dual-barreled cannon. Shoots large armor-piercing bullets at air and ground targets.
bundle.properties.block.meltdown.description: A massive laser cannon. Charges and fires a persistent laser beam at nearby enemies. Requires coolant to operate.
bundle.properties.block.command-center.description: Issues movement commands to allied units across the map.\nCauses units to rally, attack an enemy core or retreat to the core/factory. When no enemy core is present, units will default to patrolling under the attack command.
bundle.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a lightly armored hit-and-run attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into an advanced support mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a heavily-armored missile mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a quick, lightly-armored interceptor.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a heavy support bomber.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Provides transformation into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.

bundle_cs.properties.host.info:
Tento [accent]hostitel[] hostuje server na portu [scarlet]6567[]. 
Kdokoliv na stejn [lightgray]sti Wifi nebo LAN (mstn)[] by ml vidt server ve svm listu server.

Jestlie chcete, aby se uivatel pipojovali odkudkoliv pomoc adresy IP, me bt nezbytn nastavit [accent]pesmrovn port[].

[lightgray]Poznmka: Jestlie m nkdo problm s pipojenm k LAN he, ml by se pedem ujistit, e m program Mindustry povolen pstup k mstn sti v nastaven mstnho firewallu.
bundle_cs.properties.join.info:
Zde me vloit [accent]adresu IP serveru[], ke ktermu se chce pipojit, nebo zkusit nalzt [accent]servery v mstn sti[], ke kterm se me pipojit.
Jsou podporovny reimy hry vce hr pes LAN i WAN.

[lightgray]Poznmka: Neexistuje automatick globln seznam server Mindustry. Pokud se chce k nkomu pipojit pomoc adresy IP, bude ji muset znt od hostitele.

bundle_cs.properties.zone.tarFields.name: Dehtov pole
bundle_cs.properties.zone.saltFlats.name: Soln niny
bundle_cs.properties.zone.impact0078.name: Zna dopadu 0078
bundle_cs.properties.zone.crags.name: Skaln tesy
bundle_cs.properties.zone.fungalPass.name: Plsov prsmyk
bundle_cs.properties.zone.groundZero.description: Optimln msto, kde znovu zat. Nzk vskyt neptel. Nkolik mlo surovin.\nPosbrej co nejvce olova a mdi.\nB dl.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Dokonce a sem, blzko hor, se  dokzaly spry rozrst. Mrz je vak neme zadret navky.\n\nPus se do prce za pomoc energie. Stav spalovac genertory. Nau se, jak pouvat opravovac ve.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
Tyto pustiny jsou rozshl, nepedvdateln a skrz naskrz se hem oputnmi budovami.
V tto oblasti nalezne uhl. Spal ho v genertorech na energii nebo syntetizuj na grafit.

[lightgray]Toto msto pistn nelze zaruit.[]
bundle_cs.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: Na okraji pout le Soln niny. V tto lokaci se nachz jen nkolik mlo surovin.\n\nNeptel zde vybudoval zsobovac komplex. Zni jdro v jeho zkladn. Nenechej kmen na kameni.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.craters.description: V tchto relikvich starch vlek se nahromadilo velk mnostv vody. Znovu zskej tuto oblast. Sbrej psek. Vyrob z nj metasklo. Pouij vodu k chlazen svch vrt a stlen.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Za pustinou se nachz pobe. Kdysi zde stl obrann poben systm. Moc z nj u dneska nezbylo. Jen zkladn stavby zstaly ueteny, zbytek se rozpadl na rot.\nPokrauj ve sv expanzi hloubji. Objev ztracenou technologii.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Dle ve vnitrozem le hory, dosud neposkvrnny sprami.
Vyt titan, kterm tato oblast oplv. Nau se jej pouvat.

Ptomnost neptelskch jednotek je zde vt. Radi jim nedej moc asu na vysln jejich nejsilnjch jednotech.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: Tato perostl dungle se nachz ble ke zdroji spr.\nNeptel zde zbudoval pedsunutou hldku. Stav jednotky Dka a zni s jejich pomoc jdro zkladny. Zskej znovu to, co bylo ji dvno ztraceno.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
Rozhran produkn naftov oblasti mezi horami a pout. Jedna z mla oblast, kde se stle nachz dehet.
Akoliv je oblast oputn, stle se v jejm okol nachz nebezpen neptelsk sly. Nen radno je podcenit.

[lightgray]Vyzkoumej technologii na zpracovn nafty.[]
bundle_cs.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: Extrmn nebezpen mapa. Na kor prostoru se zde nachz pehrel surovin. Vysok pravdpodobnost znien. Opus tuto oblast co nejdve to pjde. Nenech se zmst dlouhmi prodlevami mezi vlnami neptel.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
Bval tovrna na zpracovn thoria, dnes v troskch.
[lightgray]Objev thorium a jeho irok vyuit.[]

Neptelsk jednotky se zde nachzej v hojnm potu, a neustle prohledvaj oblast.
bundle_cs.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: Pechodov oblast mezi vysokmi horami a sprami nasycenou zem. Nachz se zde mal przkumn zkladna Tvho neptele.\nZni ji.\nPouij mechy Dka a Sldil. Zni ob neptelsk jdra.
bundle_cs.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Jsi si jist, e chce vymazat Tv data ve he?\nTento krok je nevratn!

bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.intro:
Vtej ve [scarlet]vuce Mindustry[]. Zde se dozv zklady hran.
Poznmka: vuka pedpokld [accent]vchoz klvesy[] v nastaven, pokud jsi je zmnil, bude teba to vzt v potaz.
Pouij [accent][[WASD][] pro pohyb a [accent]koleko myi[] pro pibliovn a oddalovn.
Zani [accent]tenm mdi[]. Pibli se k mdn le u Tvho jdra a klikni na ni pro zahjen tby.

[accent]{0}/{1} mdi[]
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
Vtej ve [scarlet]vuce Mindustry[].
Pohybuj se thnutm prstem do strany.
Pibliuj a oddaluj mapu [accent]2 prsty[].
Zani [accent] tenm mdi[]. Pibli se k mdn le u Tvho jdra a upni na ni pro zahjen tby.

[accent]{0}/{1} mdi[]
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.drill:
Sm vid, e run tba nen moc efektivn.
[accent]Vrty[] umouj tit automaticky.
Klikni na vrt v nabdce v pravm dolnm rohu.
Vyber [accent]mechanick vrt[]. Umisti jej kliknutm na mdnou lu.
Tak me vybrat mechanick vrt stiskem klves [accent][[2][] a nsledn [accent][[1][] rychle po sob, nezvisle na tom, jak zloka je v nabdce zrovna otevena.
[accent]Pravm klikem[] peru stavn.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Sm vid, e run tba nen moc efektivn.
[accent]Vrty[] umouj tit automaticky.
upni na vrt v nabdce v pravm dolnm rohu.
Vyber [accent]mechanick vrt[]. Umisti jej klikutm na mdnou lu upnutm a nsledn zakrtni [accent]fajfku[] na spodku nabdky pro potvrzen volby.
upnutm na [accent]X[] peru stavn.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Kad blok m jin vlastnosti. Kad vrt me tit pouze nkter suroviny.
Pro zobrazen informac a statistik o bloku [accent]zvol "?" pi vybranm bloku ve stavebn nabdce[].

Nyn se podvej na [accent]vlastnosti mechanickho vrtu[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.conveyor:
Pro dopravu materilu k jdru jsou zapoteb [accent]dopravnky[].
Vytvo adu dopravnk od vrtu a k jdru.
Dr zmknut [accent]lev tlatko myi[], abys umstil dopravnky v jedn ad.
Kdy zmkne [accent]Ctrl[], ada dopravnk se bude umisovat navc hlopn.
Pouij [accent]koleko myi[] pro oten bloku ped umstnm.
[accent]Umsti dopravnky tak, abys dopravil m do jdra[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
Pro dopravu materilu k jdru jsou zapoteb [accent]dopravnky[].
Vytvo adu dopravnk od vrtu a k jdru.
[accent]Pokldej dopravnky v ad upnutm a delm prstu[] a thnutm v poadovanm smru.
[accent]Umsti dopravnky tak, abys dopravil m do jdra[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.turret:
Jakmile se materil dostane do jdra, me bt pouit pro stavbu.
Pamatuj si, e ne vechno lze pout pro stavbu.
Vci, kter melze pout jako stavebn materil, jako napklad [accent]uhl[] nebo [accent]rot[], nelze do jdra uloit, a zasekne tak cel dopravnk na vstupu.
Pro odehnn tonch jednotek [lightgray]neptele[] od jdra je teba postavit obrann stavby.
Postav [accent]stlnu Duo[] pobl svho jdra.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.drillturret:
Stlny Duo potebuj jako stelivo [accent]m[].
Polo mechanick vrt blzko stlny.
Pro zsobovn md ve dopravnky od vrtu ke stln.

[accent]Dorueno steliva: {0}/{1}[]
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.pause:
Bhem hry, napklad v boji, me [accent]pozastavit hru[].
Pi pozastaven me naplnovat stavbu do fronty.

[accent]Pozastav hru mezernkem[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.unpause: Te zmkni mezernk znova a pokrauj ve he.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Te upni na ikonu na stejnm mst a pokrauj ve he.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Bloky je teba nejen stavt, ale asto rozbt.
[accent]Dr prav tlatko myu[] a thni s n pro vbr blok, kter potebuje rozbt.

[accent]Zni vechen rot vlevo od Tvho jdra pouitm blokovho vbru[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Bloky je teba nejen stavt, ale asto rozbt.
[accent]upnu na ikonku kladiva dole[] a pak upni na blok, kter chce rozbt.
Rozbit vce blok se provd delm  podrenm prstu a thnutm.
Rozbit dokon upnutm na fajfku.

[accent]Zni vechen rot vlevo od Tvho jdra pouitm blokovho vbru[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
Nkdy je teba odebrat pedmty pmo z blok.
[accent]Klikni na blok[], ve kterm jsou pedmty a pak [accent]klikni na pedmt[] z invente bloku.
Vcero pedmt me bt odebrno [accent]upnutm a drenm[].

[accent]Odeber trochu mdi z jdra[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.deposit: Vloit pedmty do bloku me petaenm z Tv lodi na clov blok.\n\n[accent]Vlo odebranou m zprtky do Tvho jdra[].
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.waves:
[lightgray]Neptel[] se pibliuje.

Ubra sv jdro po dobu 2 vln. [accent]Klikni levm tlatkem[] pro stlen.
Postav vce stlen a vrt. Nat vce mdi.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
[lightgray]Neptel[] se pibliuje.

Ubra sv jdro po dobu 2 vln. Tv lo bude automaticky stlet po neptelskch jednotkch.
Postav vce stlen a vrt. Nat vce mdi.
bundle_cs.properties.tutorial.launch:
Jakmile doshne urit vlny, bude moci [accent]vyslat sv jdro zpt[]. Opust tm svou zkladnu a [accent]zsk suroviny uloen v jde[].
Zskan suroviny mohou bt pouity pro vzkum novch technologi.

[accent]Stiskni tlatko pro vysln jdra zpt[].
bundle_cs.properties.item.copper.description: Nejbnj stavebn materil. Pouv se ve vech typech blok.
bundle_cs.properties.item.lead.description: Zkladn materil. Pouv se v energetickch blocch a pi peprav kapalin.
bundle_cs.properties.item.metaglass.description: Velmi tvrd sklenn slouenina. Hodn pouvan pro ukldn a rozvod kapalin.
bundle_cs.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralizovan uhlk, pouvan v energetickch komponentch a t jako munice.
bundle_cs.properties.item.sand.description: Bn materil, kter se hojn pouv pi slvn a taven.
bundle_cs.properties.item.coal.description: Zkamenl rostliny, zformovan dvno ped vznikem mapy. Pouvan bn jako palivo a pro vyrobu dalch materl.
bundle_cs.properties.item.titanium.description: Vzcn, velice lehk kov, vyuvan hojn pi peprav kapalin, ve vrtech a pi vrob letovch stroj.
bundle_cs.properties.item.thorium.description: Hutn, radioaktivn materil, vyuvan jako strukturln podpora a nuklearn palivo.
bundle_cs.properties.item.scrap.description: Zbytky starch struktur a jednotek. Obsahuje stopov mnostv mnoha rznch kov.
bundle_cs.properties.item.silicon.description: Extrmn uiten polovodi. Vyuv se v solrnch panelech, pokroilch energetickch blocch a jako munice do samonavdcch stel ve stlnch.
bundle_cs.properties.item.plastanium.description: Lehk, kujn materil, vyuvan v pokroilm letectv a jako ttiv munice.
bundle_cs.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Takka nehmotn substance pouvan v pokroilch energetickch blocch a v samoopravnch technologich.
bundle_cs.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Vyspl slitina s jedinenmi energetickmi vlastnostmi.
bundle_cs.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Uml spr, syntetizovan pro prmyslov ely z atmosfrickch koncentrac. Jejich vyuit spov v pemn na naftu, vbuniny a jako palivo.
bundle_cs.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Nestl sms pouvan v bombch a vbuninch. Syntetizuje se ze sprovch tobolek a tkavch substanc. Nedoporuuje se vyuvat jako palivo.
bundle_cs.properties.item.pyratite.description: Extrmn vzntliv substance, pouvan ve zpalnm stelivu.
bundle_cs.properties.liquid.water.description: Nejuitenj kapalina. Hojn vyuvan jak chlazen do stroj a t pro vrobu spr.
bundle_cs.properties.liquid.slag.description: Rzn rzn druhy roztavenho kovu smchan dohromady. Lze je rozdlit na jednotliv minerly, nebo se tato slitina d pout jako munice pi stlen na neptelsk jednotky.
bundle_cs.properties.liquid.oil.description: Kapalina pouit pi pokroil vrob materil. Me bt pemnna na uhl, nebo pi rozpren a zaplen pouita jako zbra.
bundle_cs.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Neten, nereznouc kapalina, vytvoen z vody a titanu. M extrmn vysokou tepelnou kapacitu. Hojn se pouv jako chladic kapalina.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Standardn mech. Je zaloen na mechovi Dka, s vylepenm brnnm a schopnostmi stavt. Dv vce pokozen, ne ipka.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Rychl, lehce obrnn mech stvoen pro bleskov ton akce. Proti stavbm sice zpsobuje jen mal  pokozen, ale um zlikvidovat poetn skupiny neptelskch jednotek velmi rychle pomoc vbojovch zbran.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Podprn mech. L spojeneck bloky pomoc vystelen opravnch dvek. V dosahu svho psoben me lit i spojeneck jednotky.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Objemn a velice dobe obrnn mech, uren pro tok v pedn linii. Jeho pltovn zblokuje a 90% pchozho pokozen.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Standardn lo. Um rychle teit suroviny. Je dostaten rychl a lehk, ale m jen malou tonou schopnost.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Lo pro bleskov toky. Zpotku je pomal, ale doke zrychlit na velkou rychlost a peltvat nad neptelskmi zkladnami. Zpsobuje pitom znan kody svmi energetickmi zbranmi a raketami.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Tk bombardr. Um dv vci: pomhat pi stavn a niit neptelsk opevnn. Je dostaten dobe obrnn.
bundle_cs.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Obrovsk, dobe obrnn steleck lo. Je vybavena plamenometem a m vbornou schopnost manvr.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.draug.description: Jednoduch tc dron. Levn a postradateln. Automaticky t m a olovo ve sv blzkosti. Naten suroviny donese do nejbliho jdra.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.spirit.description: Modifikovan dron Dragoun, upraven pro opravu staveb, namsto ten. Automaticky opravuje pokozen bloky v oblasti svho psoben.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.phantom.description: Pokroil dron. Nsleduje uivatele. Pomh pi stavn.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.dagger.description: Zkladn pozemn jednotka. Levn vroba. Zdrcujc ve velkm houfu.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.crawler.description: Pozemn jednotka sestvajc z oholen elezn kostry s pilepenmi vbuninami. Vydr mlo a exploduje pi kontaktu s nepteli.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.titan.description: Vyspl obrnn pozemn jednotka. to jak na pozemn, tak vzdun neptelsk cle. Je vybavena dvma zmnenmi plamenomety tdy Palivec.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.fortress.description: Tk dlosteleck mech. Je vybaven dvma upravenmi kanny typu Kroupomet pro tok dalekho dosahu proti neptelskm jednotkm a stavbm.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.eruptor.description: Tk mech navren na nien budov. Pl proudy rozhavenho kovu na neptelsk opevnn. Tav a zapaluje ve v cest.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.wraith.description: Rychl sthaka pro bleskov toky. Cl na genertory energie.
bundle_cs.properties.unit.ghoul.description: Tk bombardr pro kobercov nlet. Trh neptelsk struktury, cl na kritickou infrastrukturu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.message.description: Ukld zprvu. Pouv se pro komunikaci mezi spojenci.
bundle_cs.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Pemuje neforemn kusy uhl do ulechtilch vlisk grafitu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.multi-press.description: Vylepen verze lisu na grafit. Vyuv vodu a energii k rychlejmu a efektivnjmu zpracovn uhl.
bundle_cs.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Redukuje psek vyitnm uhlm, m vyrb kemk.
bundle_cs.properties.block.kiln.description: Tav psek a olovo na sms znmou jako metasklo. Vyaduje k bhu mal mnostv energie.
bundle_cs.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produkuje plastanu z titanu a nafty.
bundle_cs.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produkuje fzovou tkaninu z radioaktivnho thoria a psku. Spotebuje k tomu vrazn mnostv energie.
bundle_cs.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produkuje rzovou slitinu z titanu, olova, kemku a mdi.
bundle_cs.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Mch vodu a jemn titanov prek do chladc kapaliny, nezbytn napklad pro thoriov reaktor.
bundle_cs.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Drt a mch shluky spr s pyratitem, m vznik vbunina.
bundle_cs.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mch uhl, olovo a psek do vysoce holavho pyratitu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.melter.description: Tav rot do roztavenho kovu pro dal zpracovn, nebo pro munici do stlny Vlna.
bundle_cs.properties.block.separator.description: Oddluje z roztavenho kovu jednotliv minerln sousti, kter na vstupu zchlazuje do pevn formy.
bundle_cs.properties.block.spore-press.description: Lisuje ze spr pod enormnm tlakem naftu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.incinerator.description: Vypa jakkoliv nadbyten pedmty nebo kapaliny, kter mu pole.
bundle_cs.properties.block.power-void.description: Zni jakoukoliv energii, kterou bloku pole. Jen pro reim Pskovit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.power-source.description: Nekonen zdroj energie. Jen pro Pskovit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.item-source.description: Nekonen zdroj pedmt. Jen pro Pskovit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.item-void.description: Zni jakkoliv vstupn pedmt, kter bloku pole. Jen pro Pskovit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Nekonen zdroj kapalin. Jen pro Pskovit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.liquid-void.description: Zni jakoukoliv kapalinu, kterou bloku pole. Jen pro Pskovit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Levn obrann blok.\nUiten k obran Tvho jdra a stlen pro prvnch nkolik vln neptel.
bundle_cs.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Levn obrann blok.\nUiten k obran Tvho jdra a stlen pro prvnch nkolik vln neptel.\nZabr vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: Stedn siln obrann blok.\nPoskytuje stedn dobrou obranu proti neptelm.
bundle_cs.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Stedn siln obrann blok.\nPoskytuje stedn dobrou obranu proti neptelm.\nZabr vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: Speciln typ zdi, kter je schopn absorbovat energetick vboje a blokuje automaticky energetick veden, napklad mezi uzly.
bundle_cs.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: Speciln typ zdi, kter je schopn absorbovat energetick vboje a blokuje automaticky energetick veden, napklad mezi uzly.\nZabr vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Siln obrann blok.\nSlun obrana ped nepteli.
bundle_cs.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Siln obrann blok.\nSlun obrana ped nepteli.\nZabr vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Ze potaen speciln odrazivou sloueninou na fzov bzi. Odr pi nrazu vtinu stel.
bundle_cs.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Ze potaen speciln odrazivou sloueninou na fzov bzi. Odr pi nrazu vtinu stel.\nZabr vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Extrmn odoln obrann blok.\nPi zsahu stelou akumuluje energii, kterou pak nhodn uvoluje ve form vboje.
bundle_cs.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Extrmn odoln obrann blok.\nPi zsahu stelou akumuluje energii, kterou pak nhodn uvoluje ve form vboje.\nZabr vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.door.description: Mal dvee, kter se daj otevt nebo zavt kliknutm/tupnutm na n.
bundle_cs.properties.block.door-large.description: Velk dvee, kter se daj otevt nebo zavt kliknutm/upnutm na n.\nZabraj vce dladic.
bundle_cs.properties.block.mender.description: Pravideln opravuje bloky ve svm poli psobnosti. Dobr pro opravu obrannho systmu mezi vlnami.\nVoliteln lze vyut kemku pro poslen dosahu a efektivity.
bundle_cs.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Vylepen verze Oprave. Opravuje bloky ve svm poli psobnosti.\nVoliteln lze vyut fzov tkaniny pro poslen dosahu a efektivity.
bundle_cs.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Zrychluje funkce budov v okol.\nVoliteln lze vyut kemku pro poslen dosahu a efektivity.
bundle_cs.properties.block.force-projector.description: Vytvo okolo sebe estihran silov pole, kter chrn jednotky a budovy uvnit ped pokozenm.\nPokud dostane moc pokozen, tak se peheje. Voliteln lze pout chlazen pro snen pehvn a fzov tkaniny pro zvten dosahu ttu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Psob pokozen neptelskm jednotkm pi selpnut. Takka neviditeln pro neptele (a i v nabdce blok :) ).
bundle_cs.properties.block.conveyor.description: Zkladn blok pro pepravu pedmt. Un pedmty kupedu a automaticky pln vhodn loit (budovy, kontejnery, jdro), kter po cest potk. Lze jej otet dle poteby.
bundle_cs.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Pokroil blok pro pepravu pedmt. Pen pedmty rychleji, ne zkladn dopravnk.
bundle_cs.properties.block.junction.description: Chov se jako most pro dva kc se psy dopravnk. Uiten pi situaci, kdy dva rozdln dopravnky dopravuj dva rozdln materily pes jedno pole.
bundle_cs.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Pokroil blok pro pepravu pedmt. Dovoluje transport pedmt a pes ti pole, a to pes jakkoliv tern nebo budovu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Pokroil blok pro pepravu pedmt. Vyuv energii k teleportaci pedmt na vzdlenost nkolika dladic mezi jinm propojenm fzovm dopravnkem.
bundle_cs.properties.block.sorter.description: Td pedmty. Pokud je pedmt shodn s vbrem, je posln rovn dl. Jinak je pedmt je odboen do strany.
bundle_cs.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Td pedmty. Pokud je pedmt shodn s vbrem, je odboen do strany. Jinak je pedmt je posln rovn dl.
bundle_cs.properties.block.router.description: Pijm pedmty z jednoho smru a posl je rovnomrn do zbylch t smr. Uiten pro rozdlen pedmt z jednoho zdroje do rznch cl, jako odboen z dopravnk a podobn.\n\n[scarlet]Pozor, nepouvejte pro vstup do produkn budovy, jinak se bude ucpvat vstupnmi pedmty[].
bundle_cs.properties.block.distributor.description: Pokroil smrova. Rozdluje pedmty rovnomrn a do 7 dalch smr.
bundle_cs.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Pedmty jsou poslny do strany, pokud je smr vped zablokovn. Uiten napklad pro zpracovn pebytenho materilu, pokud je primrn pjemce saturovn.
bundle_cs.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: Pedmty jsou poslny vped, pokud je smr do strany zablokovn. Uiten napklad pro zpracovn pebytenho materilu, pokud je primrn pjemce saturovn.
bundle_cs.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimtn blok pro pepravu pedmt. Sebere nkolik pedmt a vystel je k dalmu hromadnmu distributoru pes nkolik dladic. Vyaduje ke sv funkci energii.
bundle_cs.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Levn erpadlo s pomalm prtokem, nevyaduje vak energii k provozu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Pokroil erpadlo, kter za pomoci energie vyerp vt mnostv kapalin,  ne standardn.
bundle_cs.properties.block.conduit.description: Zkladn blok pro pepravu kapalin. Un kapaliny vped. Pouv se s erpadly, v nkterch vrtech a nebo ve spojen s jinm potrubm.
bundle_cs.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Pokroil blok pepravy kapalin. Pepravuje kapaliny rychleji a m vt kapacitu, ne zkladn potrub.
bundle_cs.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Pen kapaliny stejn rychle jako pulzn potrub, ale dky opltovn m vt vdrnost. Ze stran pijm kapaliny pouze z dalch potrub.\nV ppad pokozen m men ztrtu kapaliny.
bundle_cs.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Pijm kapaliny z jednoho smru a vypout je rovnomrn do zbylch t smr. Doke pojmout i urit objem kapalin do vnitho loit. Pouv se pi rozdlen kapaliny z jednoho zdroje smujc do rznch cl.
bundle_cs.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Ukld velk mnostv kapalin. Pouv se pro vyrovnvn zsob vody, kdy je ptok nestabiln nebo jako zlon chlazen pro ivotn dleit stavby.
bundle_cs.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Chov se jako most pro dv kc se potrub. Pouv se v situacch, kdy dv rozdln potrub vedou rozdln obsah pes jedno msto.
bundle_cs.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Pokroil blok pepravy kapalin. Dovoluje penet kapaliny pes ti dladice nap jakmkoliv ternem nebo pes budovy.
bundle_cs.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Pokroil blok pro pepravu kapalib. Vyuv energii k teleportaci kapalin na vzdlenost nkolika dladic mezi jinm propojenm fzovm potrubm.
bundle_cs.properties.block.power-node.description: Pen energii mezi propojenmi uzly. Uzel zskv energii z nebo dodv energii do blok ve svm poli psobnosti.
bundle_cs.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Pokroil energerick uzel. M vt dosah ne zkladn uzel.
bundle_cs.properties.block.surge-tower.description: Energetick uzel s extrmnm dosahem, ale mn dostupnmi ppojkami pro ostatn bloky, ne ostatn uzly.
bundle_cs.properties.block.diode.description: Energie z baterie pes tento blok protk jen jednm smrem, a to jen za podmnky, e a druh stran je mn energie (napklad vybit baterie).
bundle_cs.properties.block.battery.description: Ukld energii v ppad nadbytku v sti a poskytuje energii kdykolik, kdy se energetick sti nedostv (zporn rozdl).
bundle_cs.properties.block.battery-large.description: Ukld vce energie, ne zkladn baterie.
bundle_cs.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generuje energii spalovnm holanch materil, jako je napklad uhl.
bundle_cs.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Pokud je umstn na teplotn aktivn msto (jako je magmatick kmen), doke z tepla generovat energii.
bundle_cs.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Pokroil spalovac genertor. Efektivnj, ale vyaduje dodaten psun vody pro produkci pry.
bundle_cs.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generuje velk mnostv energie. Vyuv teplotnho rozdlu mezi chladc kapalinou a hocm pyratitem.
bundle_cs.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Radioizotopn termoenergetick genertor (RTG) je jednoduch, spolehliv genertor. Vyuv tepla z rozpadu radioaktivnch sloek ke generovn mench dvek energie.
bundle_cs.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Zkladn solrn panel pro generovn malho mnostv energie ze Slunce.
bundle_cs.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Vrazn efektivnj verze solrnho panelu pro generovn energie ze Slunce.
bundle_cs.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generuje vznamn mnostv energie z thoria. Vyaduje nepetrit chlazen. Je-li chlazen nedostaten, zpsob znanou explozi. Vstup energie zvis na me naplnn genertoru, zkladn generovn energie se aktivuje pi pln kapacit.
bundle_cs.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: Vyspl genertor, schopn vytvet pi maximlnm vkonu obrovsk mnostv energie. Vyaduje vak znan mnostv energie pro nastartovn celho procesu.
bundle_cs.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Levn vrt. Pi poloen na vhodn pole (ruda, psek) natrvalo a pomalu produkuje odpovdajc materil. Um tit jen zkladn rudy.
bundle_cs.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Vylepen vrt, kter je schopen tit i titan. T vy rychlost ne mechanick vrt.
bundle_cs.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Vrt rychleji ne penumatick vrt dky laserov technologii, ale vyaduje ke svmu fungovn energii. Doke navrtat i rudn ly thoria.
bundle_cs.properties.block.blast-drill.description: Ultimtn vrt, vyadujc k provozu znan mnostv energie.
bundle_cs.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extrahuje podzemn vodu. Vhodn pro msta, kde se nevyskytuje povrchov voda.
bundle_cs.properties.block.cultivator.description: Kultivuje drobounk koncentrace spr v atmosfe do formy vhodn pro prmyslov vyuit spr.
bundle_cs.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Vyaduje znan mnostv energie, psku a vody na ten nafty.
bundle_cs.properties.block.core-shard.description: Prvn verze jdra. Pokud je znieno, veker kontakt s mapou je ztracen. Nedopus, aby se to stalo.
bundle_cs.properties.block.core-foundation.description: Druh cerze jdra. Je lpe obrnn a pojme vce surovin.
bundle_cs.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: Tet a konen iterace vvoje jdra. Velmi dobe obrnn. Doke skladovat vznamn mnostv zdroj.
bundle_cs.properties.block.vault.description: Ukld velk mnostv pedmt od kadho typu. K vyskladnn vc z trezoru je mon pout odbavova.
bundle_cs.properties.block.container.description: Ukld men mnostv pedmt od kadho typu. K vyskladnn vc z kontejneru je mon pout odbavova.
bundle_cs.properties.block.unloader.description: Vyskladuje pedmty z kontejneru, trezoru nebo jdra na dopravnk nebo pmo do produktivnch blok. Druh pedmtu pro vyskladnn lze nastavit kliknutm nebo upnutm na odbavova.
bundle_cs.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Vysl dvky pedmt z mapy bez nutnosti vyslat zpt jdro.
bundle_cs.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: Vylepen verze vyslac ploiny. M vt lon prostor a vysl pedmty z mapy astji.
bundle_cs.properties.block.duo.description: Mal, levn stlna. Uiten proti pozemnm jednotkm.
bundle_cs.properties.block.scatter.description: Zkladn protivzdun stlna. Stl kusy olova nebo plty rotu na neptelsk jednotky.
bundle_cs.properties.block.scorch.description: Seehne pozemn jednotky blzkosti. Velmi efektivn na mal vzdlenosti.
bundle_cs.properties.block.hail.description: Mal dlosteleck stlna na dl vzdlenosti.
bundle_cs.properties.block.wave.description: Stedn velk stlna. Pl po neptelch proudy kapaliny (napklad roztavenho kovu). Um automaticky uhasit ohe, pokud je zsobena vodou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.lancer.description: Stedn velk stlna proti pozemnm jednotkm. Po nabit se stl mocn energetick paprsky.
bundle_cs.properties.block.arc.description: Mal energetick stlna. Pl vboje po neptelskch jednotkch.
bundle_cs.properties.block.swarmer.description: Stedn velk stlna s raketami. to na pozemn i vzdun cle. Pl samonavdc stely.
bundle_cs.properties.block.salvo.description: Vt, pokroilej verze stlny Duo. Pl na neptele rychl dvky stel.
bundle_cs.properties.block.fuse.description: Velk stlna s krtkm dosahem. Pl trojice energetickch paprsk blzk neptele.
bundle_cs.properties.block.ripple.description: Extrmn siln dlosteleck stlna. Pl na dlku shluky stel na neptelsk jednotky.
bundle_cs.properties.block.cyclone.description: Velk protileteck a protipozemn stlna. Pl explodujc dvky na neptele v okol.
bundle_cs.properties.block.spectre.description: Velk stlna s kannem s dvma hlavnmi. Stl velk nboje, kter pronikaj brnnm jak pozemnch, tak vzdunch neptelskch cl.
bundle_cs.properties.block.meltdown.description: Masivn laserov kann. Nabije se a pak pl nepetrit laserov paprsek na neptele v okol. Vyaduje ke sv funkci chlazen.
bundle_cs.properties.block.command-center.description: Vydv pkazy spojeneckm jednotkm na map.\nInstruuje jednotky k toku na neptelsk jdro, nvratu do jdra nebo tovrny a ke shromdn se. Pokud se na map neptelsk jdro nenachz, jednotky budou v tonm reimu dret hldku.
bundle_cs.properties.block.wraith-factory.description: Produkuje rychl sthae pro bleskov tok.
bundle_cs.properties.block.ghoul-factory.description: Vyrb tk bombardry pro kobercov nlety.
bundle_cs.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: Vyrb tk jednotky na bzi raket.
bundle_cs.properties.block.repair-point.description: Nepetrit l nejbli pokozenou jednotku v poli sv psobnosti.
bundle_cs.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na zkladnho tonho mecha.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na lehkho obrnnho mecha pro bleskov tok.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na pokroilho podprnho mecha.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na tce obrnnho mecha s raketami.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na rychlou, lehce obrnnou sthaku.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na tkho podprnho bombardra.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.
bundle_cs.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Umouje pemnu Tvho vozidla na velkou, dobe obrnnou steleckou lo.\nAktivuj kliknutm nebo upnutm, kdy se nachz nad ploinou.

bundle_de.properties.host.info:
Der [accent]Server hosten[]-Knopf startet einen Server auf den Ports [scarlet]6567[] und [scarlet]6568.[]
Jeder im gleichen [lightgray]W-Lan oder lokalen Netzwerk[] sollte deinen Server in seiner Serverliste sehen knnen.

Wenn du anderen die Verbindung ber deine IP-Adresse ermglichen willst, musst du [accent]Port-Forwarding[] durchfhren.

[lightgray]Hinweis: Falls es Probleme mit der Verbindung im Netzwerk gibt, stelle sicher, dass Mindustry in deinen Firewall-Einstellungen Zugriff auf das lokale Netzwerk hat.
bundle_de.properties.join.info:
Hier kannst du eine [accent]Server-IP[] eingeben, um dich zu verbinden, oder Server im [accent]lokalen Netzwerk[] entdecken und dich mit ihnen verbinden.
Sowohl Spielen ber das lokale Netzwerk als auch Spielen ber das Internet werden untersttzt.

[lightgray]Hinweis: Es gibt keine globale Serverliste; wenn du dich mit jemandem per IP-Adresse verbinden willst, musst du den Host nach seiner IP-Adresse fragen.

bundle_de.properties.zone.groundZero.description: Der optimale Ort, um neu anzufangen. Niedrige Bedrohung durch Gegner. Wenige Ressourcen.\nSammle so viel Kupfer und Blei wie mglich.\nMach weiter!
bundle_de.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Sogar hier, nher an den Bergen, haben sich die Sporen verbreitet. Die kalten Temperaturen knnen sie nicht fr immer im Schach halten.\n\nStarte das Wagnis in Strom. Baue Verbrennungsgeneratoren. Lerne Reparateure zu benutzen.
bundle_de.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
Diese Abflle sind riesig, unberechenbar, und durchzogen von verfallenen Sektorstrukturen.
Kohle ist in dieser Region vorhanden. Verbrenne es fr Strom, oder synthetisiere Graphit.

[lightgray]Dieser Landeort kann nicht garantiert werden.
bundle_de.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: Am Rande der Wste liegen die Salzebenen. In dieser Gegend sind Ressourcen nur sprlich vorhanden.\n\nDer Feind hat hier einen Ressourcenspeicherkomplex errichtet. Zerstre ihren Kern. Lass nichts stehen.
bundle_de.properties.zone.craters.description: Wasser hat sich in diesem Krater angesammelt, ein Relikt von den alten Kriegen. Gewinne dieses Gebiet zurck. Sammle Sand. Schmelze Metaglass. Pumpe Wasser, um Geschtztrme und Bohrer zu khlen.
bundle_de.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Vorbei an der Wste liegt die Kste. An diesem Ort befand sich einst eine Kstenverteidigungsanlage, davon ist aber nicht mehr viel brig. Lediglich einfache Verteidigungsstrukturen sind unversehrt, alles andere ist nur noch Schrott.\nSetze die Ausbreitung nach auen fort. Wiederentdecke die Technologie.
bundle_de.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Weiter im Landesinneren liegen die Berge, sie sind noch nicht von Sporen befleckt.
Extrahiere das reichlich vorhandene Titan in diesem Bereich und erlerne es zu benutzen.

Die feindliche Prsenz ist grer hier. Gib ihnen nicht die Zeit, ihre strksten Einheiten zu schicken.
bundle_de.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: Dieser Bereich ist verwachsen, nher an der Quelle der Sporen.\nDer Feind hat hier einen Auenposten errichtet. Baue Dagger-Einheiten und zerstre ihn. Gewinne zurck, was verloren gegangen ist.
bundle_de.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
Der Rand einer lfrderzone, zwischen Bergen und Wste. Eine der wenigen Pltze mit nutzbaren Teer-Reserven.
Obwohl es aufgegeben wurde, befinden sich in diesem Gebiet gefhrliche feindliche Krfte. Unterschtze sie nicht.

[lightgray]Wenn mglich, erforsche Technologien zur lverarbeitung.
bundle_de.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: Eine extrem gefhrliche Zone. Reichlich Ressourcen, aber wenig Platz. Hohe Gefahr von Zerstrung. Verlasse es so schnell wie mglich. Lass dich nicht von den groen Abstnden zwischen feindlichen Angriffen tuschen.
bundle_de.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
Eine ehemalige Anlage zur Herstellung und Verarbeitung von Thorium, die in Trmmern liegt.
[lightgray]Erforsche das Thorium und seine vielen Verwendungsmglichkeiten.

Der Feind ist hier in groer Zahl prsent und sucht stndig nach Angreifern.
bundle_de.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: Ein bergangsgebiet zwischen hohen Bergen und niedrigeren, sporenverseuchten Landschaften. Ein kleiner feindlicher Auenposten wurde hier entdeckt.\nZerstre ihn.\nNutze Dagger und Crawler-Einheiten. Zerstre die zwei Kerne.
bundle_de.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Bist du sicher, dass du die Spieldaten zurcksetzen willst?\n Diese Aktion kann nicht rckgngig gemacht werden!
bundle_de.properties.settings.clearall.confirm: [scarlet]WARNUNG![]\nDas wird jegliche Spieldaten zurcksetzen, inklusive Speicherstnde, Karten, Freischaltungen und Tastenbelegungen.\n Sobald du 'OK' drckst, wird alles zurckgesetzt und das Spiel schliet sich automatisch.
