bundle_it.properties.tutorial.intro:
Sei entrato nel[scarlet] Tutorial di Mindustry.[]
Usa[accent] [[WASD][] per muoverti.
[accent]Scorri[] per eseguire lo zoom.
Inizia[accent] minando il rame[]. Per farlo, posizionati sulla vena di rame vicina al tuo Nucleo e clicca su di essa.

[accent]{0}/{1} rame
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
Sei entrato nel[scarlet] Tutorial di Mindustry.[]
Scorri sullo schermo per muoverti.
[accent]Avvicina due dita[] per eseguire lo zoom in/out.
Inizia [accent] scavando del rame[]. Clicca un minerale di rame vicino al tuo Nucleo per farlo.

[accent]{0}/{1} rame
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drill: Ora crea una trivella.\n[accent]Le trivelle[] scavano da sole e sono pi efficienti. Piazzane una su un minerale di rame.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Ora crea una trivella.
[accent]Le trivelle[] scavano da sole e sono pi efficienti.
Tocca la scheda della trivella in basso a destra.
Seleziona la [accent]Trivella Meccanica[].
Piazzala su una vena di rame toccando, quindi premi il [accent]segno di spunta[] in basso per confermare la selezione.
Con il tasto [accent]X[] puoi annullare il posizionamento.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Ogni blocco ha statistiche diverse. Alcuni minerali richiedono trivelle specifiche.
Per controllare le informazioni e le statistiche di un blocco, [accent] tocca "?" mentre lo selezioni nel database.[]

[accent]Accedi ora alle statistiche della trivella meccanica.[]
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]I nastri trasportatori []sono usati per trasportare oggetti al Nucleo.\nCrea una linea di nastri dalla trivella al Nucleo.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]I nastri trasportatori[] sono usati per trasportare oggetti nel Nucleo.
Crea una linea di nastri trasportatori dalla trivella al Nucleo.
[accent]Piazzali in linea tenendo premuto per qualche secondo e trascinando il dito in una direzione.

[accent]Piazza 2 nastri trasportatori con lo strumento linea, quindi trasporta un oggetto fino al Nucleo.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.turret: Costruisci delle torrette per respingere il nemico[lightgray][].\nCostruisci una torretta Duo vicino alla tua base.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drillturret: La Torretta Duo richiede[accent] munizioni di rame[] per sparare.\nPosiziona una trivella e collega un nastro alla torretta per rifornirla di munizioni con il rame estratto.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.pause:
Durante la battaglia puoi[accent] mettere in pausa il gioco.[]
Puoi disporre gli edifici mentre il gioco  in pausa.

Per mettere in pausa, premi [accent]spazio[].
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
Durante la battaglia puoi[accent] mettere in pausa il gioco.[]
Puoi disporre gli edifici mentre il gioco  in pausa.

Per mettere in pausa, premi il bottone in alto a sinistra.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.unpause: Ora premi di nuovo spazio per annullare la pausa.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Ora premilo di nuovo per annullare la pausa.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.breaking: I blocchi spesso devono essere distrutti.\n[accent]Tieni premuto il tasto destro del mouse []per distruggere tutti i blocchi in una selezione.[]\n[accent]Distruggi tutti i blocchi di scarto a sinistra del tuo Nucleo usando la selezione dell'area.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
I blocchi spesso devono essere distrutti.
[accent]Seleziona la modalit di decostruzione[], quindi tocca un blocco per iniziare a smantellarlo.
Distruggi un'area tenendo premuto il dito per alcuni secondi[] e trascinando in una direzione.
Premi il pulsante con il segno di spunta per confermare la rimozione.

[accent]Distruggi tutti i blocchi di scarto a sinistra del tuo Nucleo usando la selezione dell'area.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In alcune situazioni,  necessario prendere gli oggetti direttamente dai blocchi.
Per fare ci, [accent]tocca un blocco []con oggetti al suo interno, quindi[accent] tocca l'oggetto []nell'inventario.
Puoi prelevare pi oggetti insieme[accent]tenendo premuto il tasto sinistro del mouse[].
[accent]Preleva un po' di rame dal Nucleo.[]
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.deposit: Deposita tutti gli oggetti che trasporti trascinandoli dalla tua nave al blocco di destinazione.\n[accent]Rimetti il rame nel Nucleo. []
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.waves: [lightgray]Il nemico si avvicina.\nDifendi il tuo Nucleo per 2 ondate. Costruisci pi torrette. Puoi sparare tenendo premuto il tasto sinistro del mouse.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
[lightgray]Il nemico si avvicina.

Difendi il Nucleo per 2 ondate. La tua nave sparer automaticamente contro i nemici.
Costruisci pi torrette.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.launch:
Una volta raggiunta un'ondata specifica, sarai in grado di [accent]decollare con il Nucleo[], lasciando la zona e abbandonando le tue difese e le tue strutture
Otterrai [accent]tutte le risorse nel tuo Nucleo[] e potrai quindi usarle per ricercare nuove tecnologie.

[accent]Decolla e conferma per terminare il tutorial.
bundle_it.properties.item.lead.description: Un materiale di base, molto usato nei blocchi per il trasporto.
bundle_it.properties.item.metaglass.description: Un durissimo composto di vetro. Ampiamente usato per trasporto di liquidi ed immagazzinamento.
bundle_it.properties.item.graphite.description: Carbone mineralizzato, utilizzato per munizioni e componenti elettrici.
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.description: Un materiale di base che viene usato molto nei processi di fusione, sia come lega che come reagente.
bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.description: Un raro metallo incredibilmente leggero usato ampiamente nella costruzione di trasporti, trivelle e navi.
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.description: Un materiale denso e radioattivo, utilizzato nella costruzione di strutture e come carburante del reattore nucleare.
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.description: Resti rimanenti di vecchie strutture ed unit. Contiene tracce di molti metalli diversi.
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.description: Un semiconduttore molto utile che viene utilizzato nei pannelli solari e nei macchinari elettronici.
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.description: Un materiale leggero e duttile, utilizzato nelle navi avanzate e come munizione.
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Una sostanza quasi senza peso utilizzata nell'elettronica avanzata e nella tecnologia autoriparante.
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Una lega avanzata con propriet elettriche uniche.
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Utilizzato per la conversione in petrolio, esplosivi e carburante.
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Un composto altamente volatile, utilizzato nella produzione di bombe ed esplosivi. Pu essere utilizzato come combustibile anche se non  consigliabile.
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.description: Una sostanza molto infiammabile che viene utilizzata nelle armi da fuoco.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.description: Il liquido pi utile. Comunemente usato per il raffreddamento di macchinari ed il trattamento dei rifiuti.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.slag.description: Diversi tipi di metalli fusi, mescolati insieme. Pu essere separato nei suoi minerali costituenti o spruzzato sulle unit nemiche come un'arma.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.description: Un liquido usato nella produzione avanzata.\nPu essere convertito in carbone per uso combustibile o spruzzato ed incendiato come arma.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: Un liquido inerte e non corrosivo creato da acqua e titanio.\n il liquido pi efficiente per il raffreddamento.
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Il mech standard.  abbastanza veloce e produce abbastanza danni, pu anche generare 3 droni per aumentare il suo danno complessivo.
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Un mech veloce, poco armato fatto per giocare a tocca e fuga con il nemico. Fa poco danno alle strutture, ma pu uccidere un gran nummero di nemici grazie alle sue armi ad alto voltaggio.
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Un mech di supporto. Cura i blocchi danneggiati sparandogli contro. Pu spegnere fuochi e curare i compagni di squadra.
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Un mech ingombrante e ben armato, fatto per stare in prima linea. La sue difese possono bloccare fino al 90% dei danni.
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: La navicella standard. Scava velocemente. Veloce e leggera, ma con scarse potenzialit nella difesa.
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Una navetta da tocca e fuga. Anche se inizialmente lenta, pu accelerare ad alte velocit e volare sopra gli avamposti dei nemici, e provocare molti danni ai nemici tramite l'utilizzo di fulmini o missili.
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Un bombardiere pesante. Molto ben protetto.
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Una grande e ben armata macchina da guerra. Equipaggiata con lanciafamme e con accelerazione veloce.
bundle_it.properties.unit.draug.description: Un drone minerario primitivo. Economico da produrre. Sacrificabile. Scava automaticamente rame e piombo nelle vicinanze. Fornisce risorse estratte al Nucleo pi vicino.
bundle_it.properties.unit.spirit.description: L'unit drone di partenza. Si genera nel Nucleo per impostazione predefinita. Scava automaticamente, raccoglie oggetti e ripara blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.description: Un'unit drone avanzata. Scava automaticamente, raccoglie oggetti e ripara blocchi. Significativamente pi efficace del drone di partenza.
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.description: Un unit terrena base, molto pi efficiente se in branco.
bundle_it.properties.unit.crawler.description: Un'unit di terra costituita da un telaio essenziale con potenti esplosivi legati sulla parte superiore. Non particolarmente resistente. Esplode a contatto con i nemici.
bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.description: Un'unit di terra corazzata avanzata equipaggiata con due piccoli lanciafiamme. Attacca sia bersagli terrestri che aerei.
bundle_it.properties.unit.fortress.description: Un'unit di terra di artiglieria pesante.
bundle_it.properties.unit.eruptor.description: Un mech pesante progettato per abbattere le strutture. Spara un flusso di scoria contro le fortificazioni nemiche, sciogliendole e dando fuoco a tutto.
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.description: Un bombardiere pesante. Utilizza composti esplosivi o pirite come munizioni.
bundle_it.properties.block.message.description: Memorizza un messaggio. Utilizzato per la comunicazione tra alleati.
bundle_it.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Comprime pezzi di carbone in fogli di grafite puri.
bundle_it.properties.block.multi-press.description: Una versione aggiornata della pressa per grafite. Impiega acqua ed energia per elaborare il carbone in modo rapido ed efficiente.
bundle_it.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Fonde sabbia e carbone riscaldati per ottenere silicio.
bundle_it.properties.block.kiln.description: Fonde la sabbia ed il piombo in vetro metallico. Richiede piccole quantit di energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produce plastanio da petrolio e titanio.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produce tessuto di fase da torio radioattivo ed elevate quantit di sabbia.
bundle_it.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produce leghe di sovratensione da titanio, piombo, silicio e rame.
bundle_it.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combina acqua e titanio in criofluido che  molto pi efficiente per il raffreddamento.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Frantuma e mescola le spore con la pirite per produrre composto esplosivo.
bundle_it.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mescola carbone, piombo e sabbia in pirite altamente infiammabile.
bundle_it.properties.block.melter.description: Riscalda la pietra a temperature molto elevate per ottenere scoria liquida.
bundle_it.properties.block.separator.description: Sottopone le scoria a centrifugazione per ottenere i vari minerali contenuti.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Polverizza la pietra.\nUtile quando manca la sabbia naturale.
bundle_it.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifica il petrolio in pezzi di carbone.
bundle_it.properties.block.incinerator.description: Elimina qualsiasi oggetto o liquido in eccesso.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-void.description: Elimina tutta l'energia che riceve. Esiste solo nella modalit creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-source.description: Produce energia infinita. Esiste solo nella modalit creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.item-source.description: Produce oggetti infiniti. Esiste solo nella modalit creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.item-void.description: Elimina gli oggetti che vi entrano senza bisogno di energia. Esiste solo nella modalit creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Emette continuamente liquidi. Esiste solo nella modalit creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-void.description: Elimina i liquidi in entrata. Esiste solo nella modalit creativa.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Un blocco difensivo economico.\nUtile per proteggere il Nucleo e le torrette nelle prime ondate.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Un blocco difensivo economico.\nUtile per proteggere il Nucleo e le torrette nelle prime ondate.\nOccupa pi blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: Un blocco difensivo moderatamente forte.\nFornisce una protezione moderata dai nemici.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: Un blocco difensivo moderatamente forte.\nFornisce una protezione moderata dai nemici.\nOccupa pi blocchi
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: Un tipo speciale di muro che assorbe gli archi elettrici e blocca le connessioni automatiche del nodo d'energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: Un tipo speciale di muro che assorbe gli archi elettrici e blocca le connessioni automatiche dei nodi d'energia.\nSi estende su pi blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: Un forte blocco difensivo.\nBuona protezione dai nemici.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Un forte blocco difensivo.\nBuona protezione dai nemici.\nOccupa pi blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Non  forte come un muro di torio, ma devia i proiettili a meno che non siano troppo potenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Non  forte come un muro di torio, ma devia i proiettili a meno che non siano troppo potenti.\nOccupa pi blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall.description: Il blocco difensivo pi forte.\nHa una piccola possibilit di innescare un fulmine verso l'attaccante.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: Il blocco difensivo pi forte.\nHa una piccola possibilit di innescare un fulmine verso l'attaccante.\nOccupa pi blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.block.door.description: Una piccola porta che pu essere aperta e chiusa toccandola.\nSe aperta, i nemici possono sparare ed attraversare.
bundle_it.properties.block.door-large.description: Una grande porta che pu essere aperta e chiusa toccandola.\nSe aperta, i nemici possono sparare ed attraversare.\nOccupa pi blocchi.
bundle_it.properties.block.mender.description: Ripara periodicamente blocchi nelle vicinanze.\nUtilizza del silicio per aumentarne portata ed efficienza.
bundle_it.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Ripara periodicamente blocchi nelle vicinanze.\nUtilizza del tessuto di fase per aumentarne portata ed efficienza.
bundle_it.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Aumenta la velocit di edifici vicini come trivelle e nastri trasportatori.
bundle_it.properties.block.force-projector.description: Crea un campo di forza esagonale attorno a s, proteggendo gli edifici e le unit all'interno da danni causati da proiettili.
bundle_it.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Danneggia i nemici che la calpestano. Quasi invisibile al nemico.
bundle_it.properties.block.conveyor.description: Nastro di base. Sposta gli oggetti in avanti e li deposita automaticamente in altri blocchi.  rotabile.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Nastro avanzato. Sposta gli oggetti pi velocemente dei nastri standard.
bundle_it.properties.block.armored-conveyor.description: Trasporta gli oggetti alla stessa velocit del nastro avanzato, ma  pi resistente. Accetta input dai lati solo da altri nastri.
bundle_it.properties.block.junction.description: Permette di incrociare nastri che trasportano materiali diversi in posizioni diverse.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Consente il trasporto di oggetti fino a 3 blocchi ad un altro nastro sopraelevato.\nPu passare sopra ad altri blocchi od edifici.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Nastro avanzato. Consuma energia per teletrasportare gli oggetti su un altro nastro di fase collegato.
bundle_it.properties.block.sorter.description: Divide gli oggetti. Se l'oggetto corrisponde a quello selezionato, Pu passare. Altrimenti viene espulso sui lati.
bundle_it.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Elabora gli oggetti come uno filtro standard, ma in uscita d gli elementi selezionati ai lati.
bundle_it.properties.block.router.description: Accetta gli elementi da una direzione e li emette fino a 3 altre direzioni allo stesso modo. Utile per suddividere i materiali da una fonte a pi destinazioni.
bundle_it.properties.block.distributor.description: Un distributore avanzato che divide gli oggetti in altre 7 direzioni allo stesso modo.
bundle_it.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: Distribuisce gli oggetti ai lati se il nastro davanti a s  saturo.
bundle_it.properties.block.underflow-gate.description: L'opposto di un separatore per eccesso. Distribuisce gli oggetti nel nastro davanti a s se i nastri a destra e a sinistra sono saturi.
bundle_it.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimo blocco di trasporto di oggetti. Raccoglie diversi oggetti e poi li spara su un'altra lancia materiali a lungo raggio.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Una pompa economica a bassa efficienza, ma nessun consumo di energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Una pompa avanzata che raddoppia la velocit consumando energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: La pompa migliore. Tre volte pi veloce di una pompa meccanica e l'unica pompa in grado di recuperare la lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.conduit.description: Condotto di base. Funziona come un nastro trasportatore, ma per i liquidi. Ideale per estrattori, pompe o altri condotti.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Condotto avanzato. Trasporta pi liquido e pi velocemente dei condotti standard.
bundle_it.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Trasferisce i liquidi alla stessa velocit del Condotto a Impulsi, ma  pi resistente. Non accetta liquidi dai lati da parte di condotti diversi.\nMeno perdite.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accetta i liquidi da una direzione e li emette fino a 3 altre direzioni allo stesso modo. Pu anche immagazzinare una certa quantit di liquido. Utile per suddividere i liquidi da una fonte verso pi destinazioni.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Conserva una grande quantit di liquidi. Usalo per creare zone cuscinetto quando c' una domanda non costante di materiali o come protezione per il raffreddamento di blocchi vitali.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Permette di incrociare condotti che trasportano liquidi diversi in posizioni diverse.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Consente il trasporto di liquidi fino a 3 blocchi da un altro condotto sopraelevato.\nPu passare sopra ad altri blocchi od edifici.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Condotto avanzato. Consuma energia per teletrasportare i liquidi in un altro condotto di fase collegato.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node.description: Trasmette energia tra i nodi collegati.  possibile creare fino a quattro collegamenti.\nClicca sul nodo per configurare i collegamenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Ha un raggio maggiore rispetto al Nodo Energetico e si possono creare un massimo di sei collegamenti.\nClicca sul nodo per configurare i collegamenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-tower.description: Un nodo di alimentazione a lungo raggio solo due connessioni disponibili.\nClicca sul nodo per configurare i collegamenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.diode.description: L'energia della batteria pu attraversare questo blocco in una sola direzione, ma solo se l'altra parte ha meno energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery.description: Accumula energia ogni volta che c' abbondanza e fornisce energia ogni volta che c' carenza, purch sia carica.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery-large.description: Immagazzina molta pi energia di una normale batteria.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Genera una grande quantit di energia dalla lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Pi efficiente di un generatore a combustione, ma richiede l'aggiunta di acqua.
bundle_it.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Genera grandi quantit di energia. Utilizza la differenza di temperatura tra criofluido e pirite in combustione.
bundle_it.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Un generatore che sfrutta il calore del decadimento di materiale radioattivo per produrre energia.\nNon richiede raffreddamento ma fornisce meno energia di un reattore al torio.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Fornisce una piccola quantit di energia dal sole.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Fornisce un'alimentazione migliore rispetto a un pannello solare standard, ma  anche molto pi costoso da costruire.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Genera enormi quantit di energia dal torio altamente radioattivo. Richiede un raffreddamento costante. Esploder violentemente se vengono fornite quantit insufficienti di refrigerante.
bundle_it.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: Un generatore avanzato, in grado di creare enormi quantit di energia alla massima efficienza. Richiede un significativo apporto di energia per avviare il processo.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Una trivella economica. Se posizionata su slot appropriati, estrae minerali a un ritmo lento e costante.
bundle_it.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Una trivella migliorata pi veloce ed in grado di elaborare materiali pi duri sfruttando la pressione dell'aria.
bundle_it.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Consente di perforare ancora pi velocemente attraverso la tecnologia laser, ma richiede energia. Inoltre, con questa trivella  possibile recuperare il torio radioattivo.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-drill.description: La trivella migliore. Richiede grandi quantit di energia.
bundle_it.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Estrae l'acqua dal terreno. Usalo quando non c' nessun lago nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.cultivator.description: Coltiva il terreno con acqua per ottenere materia organica.
bundle_it.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Utilizza grandi quantit di energia per estrarre petrolio dalla sabbia. Usalo quando non c' una fonte diretta di petrolio nelle vicinanze.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-shard.description: La prima iterazione del Nucleo. Una volta distrutto, tutti i contatti con la regione vengono persi. Non lasciare che questo accada.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-foundation.description: La seconda versione del Nucleo. Meglio corazzato. Immagazzina pi risorse.
bundle_it.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: La terza ed ultima versione del Nucleo. Estremamente ben corazzato. Immagazzina enormi quantit di risorse.
bundle_it.properties.block.vault.description: Immagazzina una grande quantit di oggetti. Usalo per creare zone cuscinetto quando c' una domanda non costante di materiali. Uno [lightgray]scaricatore[] pu essere utilizzato per recuperare elementi dal deposito.
bundle_it.properties.block.container.description: Immagazzina una piccola quantit di oggetti. Usalo per creare zone cuscinetto quando c' una domanda non costante di materiali. Uno [lightgray]scaricatore[] pu essere utilizzato per recuperare elementi dal contenitore.
bundle_it.properties.block.unloader.description: Scarica gli oggetti da un contenitore, deposito o Nucleo su un nastro trasportatore o direttamente in un blocco adiacente. L'oggetto da scaricare pu essere scelto toccando lo scaricatore.
bundle_it.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Lancia oggetti nel tuo Nucleo senza necessit di un lasciare la zona.
bundle_it.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: Una versione migliore dell'Ascensore Spaziale, immagazzina pi oggetti. Lancia oggetti pi frequentemente.
bundle_it.properties.block.scatter.description: Una torretta antiaerea di medie dimensioni. Spara schegge di piombo o frammenti di rottami sulle unit nemiche.
bundle_it.properties.block.scorch.description: Brucia qualsiasi nemico di terra vicino ad esso. Molto efficace a distanza ravvicinata.
bundle_it.properties.block.wave.description: Una torretta a fuoco rapido di medie dimensioni che spara liquidi.
bundle_it.properties.block.lancer.description: Una torretta di medie dimensioni che dopo un breve caricamento spara potenti fasci elettrici.
bundle_it.properties.block.arc.description: Una piccola torretta che spara elettricit in un arco casuale verso il nemico.
bundle_it.properties.block.swarmer.description: Una torretta di medie dimensioni che spara missili esplosivi.
bundle_it.properties.block.salvo.description: Una torretta di medie dimensioni che spara colpi in salve.
bundle_it.properties.block.fuse.description: Una grande torretta a corto raggio che spara tre potenti schegge perforanti.
bundle_it.properties.block.ripple.description: Una grande torretta di artiglieria che spara pi colpi contemporaneamente.
bundle_it.properties.block.cyclone.description: Una grande torretta a fuoco rapido.
bundle_it.properties.block.spectre.description: Una grande torretta che spara due potenti proiettili contemporaneamente.
bundle_it.properties.block.meltdown.description: Una grande torretta che spara un potente laser a lungo raggio.
bundle_it.properties.block.command-center.description: D istruzioni alle unit alleate nella mappa. Comanda la ricongizione, l'attacco del Nucleo Nemico o la ritirata verso il proprio Nucleo o fabbrica.\nQuando non  presente un Nucleo Nemico, le unit pattuglieranno anche se viene ordinato un attacco.
bundle_it.properties.block.draug-factory.description: Produce droni per la raccolta mineraria.
bundle_it.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produce droni avanzati che seguono il giocatore e lo assistono nella costruzione.
bundle_it.properties.block.dagger-factory.description: Produce unit di base corpo a corpo di terra.
bundle_it.properties.block.crawler-factory.description: Produce unit di sciame veloci ed autodistruggenti.
bundle_it.properties.block.titan-factory.description: Produce unit terrestri avanzate e corazzate.
bundle_it.properties.block.fortress-factory.description: Produce unit di terra di artiglieria pesante.
bundle_it.properties.block.repair-point.description: Cura continuamente l'unit danneggiata pi vicina.
bundle_it.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in un mech di attacco di base.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.
bundle_it.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in un mech veloce e leggermente corazzato, ideale per colpire e scappare.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.
bundle_it.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in un mech di supporto in grado di curare edifici ed unit alleate.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.
bundle_it.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in un mech voluminoso e ben corazzato, creato per gli assalti in prima linea.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.
bundle_it.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in un intercettore forte e veloce con armi elettriche.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.
bundle_it.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in un bombardiere pesante e ben corazzato.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.
bundle_it.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Trasforma la tua nave in una nave grande e ben corazzata.\nUsa il blocco toccando due volte mentre ti trovi su di esso.

bundle_ja.properties.be.update: A new Bleeding Edge build is available:
bundle_ja.properties.launchinfo: [unlaunched][[LAUNCH] your core to obtain the items indicated in blue.
bundle_ja.properties.mod.noerrorplay: [scarlet]You have mods with errors.[] Either disable the affected mods or fix the errors before playing.
bundle_ja.properties.mod.nowdisabled: [scarlet]Mod '{0}' is missing dependencies:[accent] {1}\n[lightgray]These mods need to be downloaded first.\nThis mod will be automatically disabled.
bundle_ja.properties.mod.item.remove: This item is part of the[accent] '{0}'[] mod. To remove it, uninstall that mod.
bundle_ja.properties.mod.author: [LIGHT_GRAY]:[] {0}
bundle_ja.properties.mod.scripts.unsupported: Your device does not support mod scripts. Some mods will not function correctly.
bundle_ja.properties.workshop.menu: Select what you would like to do with this item.
bundle_ja.properties.missing: This item has been deleted or moved.\n[lightgray]The workshop listing has now been automatically un-linked.
bundle_ja.properties.publish.confirm: Are you sure you want to publish this?\n\n[lightgray]Make sure you agree to the Workshop EULA first, or your items will not show up!
bundle_ja.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The frigid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\n
bundle_ja.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_ja.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.

bundle_ja.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_ja.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_ja.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_ja.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.

De [accent]host[] knop hosts `een server op port [scarlet]6567[].

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: IAls iemand moeilijkheden heeft met het meedoen aan jouw spel, kijk of je Mindustry in je firewall instellingen toegang hebt gegeven to jouw locaal netwerk.

bundle_nl.properties.zone.overgrowth.name: Overgroeid

bundle_nl.properties.zone.saltFlats.name: Zoutvlaktes
bundle_nl.properties.zone.impact0078.name: Impact 0078
bundle_nl.properties.zone.crags.name: Crags
bundle_nl.properties.zone.fungalPass.name: Schimmelpad
bundle_nl.properties.zone.groundZero.description: De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nDelf zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nVertrek.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houdt ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industrile revolutie. Bouw fossiele generatoren. Leer hoe te repareren.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.
Steenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, of verwerk het tot grafiet.

[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.craters.description: Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herover dit gebied. Delf zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren om ze te koelen.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Voorbij de ruines is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd maar er is weinig van terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Verder vanaf de kust liggen de bergen, nog niet aangetast door de schimmels.
Delf de grote hoeveelheiden titanium titanium in het gebied en leer het te gebruiken.

De vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig de vijand. Herneem wat ooit verloren was.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
De randen van een olieveld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.
Ondanks dat het verlaten is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.

[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je verder allemaal met olie kan doen.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: Een zeer gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
Een voormalige installatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium ligt er nu verlaten bij.
[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervan.

De vijand is hier aanwezig in grote getalen, constant waakzaam voor aanvallers.
bundle_nl.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: Een transitiegebied tussen de hogergelegen bergen en de lagergelegen, beschimmelde gebieden. Een kleine verkenningsbasis is hier gepositioneerd.\nVernietig het.\nGebruik Dolk en Kruiper units. Maak de twee cores onbruikbaar.
bundle_nl.properties.settings.clear.confirm: Weet je zeker dat je deze data wilt verwijderen?\nDit is niet terug te draaien!

bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.intro:
Welkom bij de[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Begin met het[accent] delven van koper[]. Klik op een vakje met koper om het te delven.

[accent]{0}/{1} koper
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.intro.mobile:
Welkom bij de[scarlet] Mindustry Tutorial.[]
Veeg over het scherm om te bewegen.
[accent]Knijp met 2 vingers [] om in en uit te zoomen.
Begin met het[accent] delven van koper[]. Beweeg dichterbij, en klik er dan op.

[accent]{0}/{1} koper
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill: Met de hand delven is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []kunnen automatisch voor je delven.\nPlaats er een op de koper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill.mobile:
Met de hand delven is inefficient.
[accent]Drills []kunnen automatisch voor je delven.
Zoek de drill rechts onderin.
Selecter de[accent] mechanische drill[].
Plaats het op de koper door erop te klikken, druk dan op het[accent] vinkje[] om het bouwen te bevestigen.
Klik op de[accent] X knop[] om het te anuleren.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.blockinfo:
Elk blok heeft andere statistieken. Elke drill kan enkel bepaalde dingen delven.
Om het van een blok te checken,[accent] druk op de "?" knop terwijl je het blok vast hebt.[]

[accent]Lees de stats van de Mechanische Drill maar eens.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Lopende Banden[] worden gebruikt om je items naar je core te krijgen.\nLeg een line aan van je drills tot aan je core.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor.mobile:
[accent]Lopende Banden[] worden gebruikt om je items naar je core te krijgen.
Leg een line aan van je drills tot aan je core.
[accent] Doe dit door je vinger een paar seconden stil te houden[] en dan in een richting te slepen.

[accent]{0}/{1} lopende banden in 1x geplaatst
[accent]0/1 items afgeleverd
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensieve gebouwen moeten worden gebouwd tegen de[LIGHT_GRAY] vijand[].\nBouw een duo kannon bij je basis.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo's hebben[accent] koperen ammunitie []nodig om te schieten.\nPlaats een drill ernaast om het van koper te voorzien.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.pause:
Tijdens een gevecht is het mogelijk[accent] het spel te pauzeren.[]
Je kan nog wel je gebouwen plannen.

[accent]Pauzeer het spel (spatie) nu.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.pause.mobile:
During battle, you are able to[accent] pause the game.[]
You may queue buildings while paused.

[accent]Press this button in the top left to pause.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.unpause: Doe het opnieuw om weer verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.unpause.mobile: Doe het opnieuw om weer verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.breaking:
Vaak moet je blokken weer verwijderen.
[accent]Houd rechts-klik ingedrukt[] om alle geselecteerde blokken te vernietigen.[]

[accent]Vernietig de scrap blokken links van je core om verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.breaking.mobile:
Vaak moet je blokken weer verwijderen.
[accent]klik op de hamer voor vernietigigs-mode[], klik dan op een blok om het te breken.
Vernietig een heel gebied door je vinger een paar seconden still te houden en dan te slepen in een richting.
Klik dan op het vinkje om het te bevestigen.

[accent]Vernietig de scrap blokken links van je core om verder te gaan.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.withdraw:
In sommige situaties, is het nodig om items uit een blok te kunnen pakken.
Om dit te doen, [accent]klik je op een blok[] waar items in zitten, en dan [accent]op het item te klikken[] in het zwarte menu.
Meerdere items tegelijk kan je eruit halen door [accent]het ingedrukt te houden[].

[accent]Pak wat koper uit de core.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.deposit: Je kan de items weer terugstoppen door van je schip het terug te slepen naar waar je het wilt.\n\n[accent]Stop het nu weer terug in de core.[]
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves: De[LIGHT_GRAY] vijand[] naderd.\n\nVerdedig je core voor 2 rondes. Bouw meer verdedigingen.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves.mobile:
De[LIGHT_GRAY] vijand[] naderd.

Verdedig je core voor 2 rondes. Je schip schiet automatisch op vijanden.
Bouw meer verdedigingen, en mine meer koper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.launch:
Tijdens sommige waves, kan je je core[accent] lanceren[], hiermee verlaat je de basis permanent[accent] maar je neemt wel alles dat in de core zit met je mee.[]
Met deze grondstoffen kan je nieuwe technologien onderzoeken.

[accent]Druk op de lanceerknop.
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.description: Een nuttig materiaal voor gebouwen. Wordt erg vaak in blokken gebruikt.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.description: Een basismateriaal. Wordt vaak gebruikt in elektronica en vloeistoftransport.
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl.properties.item.graphite.description: Mineralized carbon, used for ammunition and electrical insulation.
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.slag.description: Various different types of molten metal mixed together. Can be separated into its constituent minerals, or sprayed at enemy units as a weapon.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.draug.description: A primitive mining drone. Cheap to produce. Expendable. Automatically mines copper and lead in the vicinity. Delivers mined resources to the closest core.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.crawler.description: A ground unit consisting of a stripped-down frame with high explosives strapped on top. Not particular durable. Explodes on contact with enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced, armored ground unit. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_nl.properties.unit.eruptor.description: A heavy mech designed to take down structures. Fires a stream of slag at enemy fortifications, melting them and setting volatiles on fire.
bundle_nl.properties.block.message.description: Stores a message. Used for communication between allies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.graphite-press.description: Compresses chunks of coal into pure sheets of graphite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.multi-press.description: An upgraded version of the graphite press. Employs water and power to process coal quickly and efficiently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl.properties.block.kiln.description: Smelts sand and lead into metaglass. Requires small amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.coal-centrifuge.description: Solidifes oil into chunks of coal.
bundle_nl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-wall-large.description: A moderately strong defensive block.\nProvides moderate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-wall-large.description: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mender.description: Periodically repairs blocks in its vicinity. Keeps defenses repaired in-between waves.\nOptionally uses silicon to boost range and efficiency.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.sorter.description: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.
bundle_nl.properties.block.inverted-sorter.description: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overflow-gate.description: A combination splitter and router that only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plated-conduit.description: Moves liquids at the same rate as pulse conduits, but possesses more armor. Does not accept fluids from the sides by anything other than conduits.\nLeaks less.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-tower.description: An extremely long-range power node with fewer available connections.
bundle_nl.properties.block.diode.description: Battery power can flow through this block in only one direction, but only if the other side has less power stored.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.differential-generator.description: Generates large amounts of energy. Utilizes the temperature difference between cryofluid and burning pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at half capacity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.impact-reactor.description: An advanced generator, capable of creating massive amounts of power at peak efficiency. Requires a significant power input to kickstart the process.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates spores with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_nl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-shard.description: The first iteration of the core capsule. Once destroyed, all contact to the region is lost. Do not let this happen.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-foundation.description: The second version of the core. Better armored. Stores more resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.core-nucleus.description: The third and final iteration of the core capsule. Extremely well armored. Stores massive amounts of resources.
bundle_nl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad.description: Launches batches of items without any need for a core launch. Unfinished.
bundle_nl.properties.block.launch-pad-large.description: An improved version of the launch pad. Stores more items. Launches more frequently.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scorch.description: Burns any ground enemies close to it. Highly effective at close range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.command-center.description: Issues movement commands to allied units across the map.\nCauses units to patrol, attack an enemy core or retreat to the core/factory. When no enemy core is present, units will default to patrolling under the attack command.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.dart-mech-pad.description: Provides transformation into a basic attack mech.\nUse by tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.discord: Sluit je aan bij de Mindustry discord server!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.link.itch.io.description: Itch.io pagina met de PC downloads en online versie
bundle_nl_BE.properties.linkfail: Openen van link mislukt!\nDe link is gekopierd naar je klembord.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.screenshot.invalid: Kaart te groot, mogelijks te weinig geheugen voor een screenshot te kunnen maken.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.be.update: A new Bleeding Edge build is available:
bundle_nl_BE.properties.schematic.replace: Er bestaat al een blaudruk met deze naam. Vervangen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.schematic.delete.confirm: This schematic will be utterly eradicated.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.launchinfo: [unlaunched][[LAUNCH] je kern om de met blauw aangeduide voorwerpen te verkrijgen.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.showagain: Toon dit volgende keer niet meer.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.mods.alphainfo: Mods zijn nog in alfa en [scarlet] kunnen zeer onstabiel zijn[].\nMeld problemen die je ondervindt op de Mindustry Github of Discord.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.delete.error: Kan mod niet verwijderen. Bestand is mogelijk in gebruik.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.noerrorplay: [scarlet]You have mods with errors.[] Either disable the affected mods or fix the errors before playing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.nowdisabled: [scarlet]De volgende vereisten ontbreken voor mod '{0}':[accent] {1}\n[lightgray]Deze mods moeten eerst gedownload worden.\nDeze mod wordt automatisch uitgeschakeld.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.requiresrestart: The game will now close to apply the mod changes.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.item.remove: This item is part of the[accent] '{0}'[] mod. To remove it, uninstall that mod.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.missing: Dit opslagbestand bevat mods die zijn geupdate of recentelijk zijn verwijderd. Uw opslagbestand kan beschadigd geraken. Bent u zeker dat u wil verdergaan?\n[lightgray]Mods:\n{0}
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.preview.missing: Voordat je de mod publiceert moet je een afbeelding voor de voorvertoning toevoegen.\nPlaats een afbeelding met de naam[accent] preview.png[] in de modfolder.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.folder.missing: Mods kunnen enkel gepubliceerd worden in foldervorm.\nOm een mod in foldervorm te zetten exporteer je het modbestand uit de zipfile en verwijder je de oude zipfile. Herlaad vervolgens je mods of herstart het spel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mod.scripts.unsupported: Your device does not support mod scripts. Some mods will not function correctly.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.kick: Je bent uit de server gegooid!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.whitelist: Je bent niet toegestaan om met deze server te verbinden. (Whitelist)
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.vote: Je bent uit de server gegooid na een stemming!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.serverOutdated: Verouderde server! Vraag de eigenaar van de server om de server te updaten!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.banned: Je bent verbannen van deze server.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.typeMismatch: Deze server is niet compatibel met jouw Mindustry build type.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.playerLimit: De server is vol, wacht voor een plekje.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.recentKick: Je bent zonet van de server gegooid.\nWacht even voor je weer verbindt
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.nameInUse: Er is al iemand met dezelfde naam op de server.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.idInUse: Je bent al verbonden met de server! Verbinden met 2 clients tegelijk is verboden.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Deze server ondersteunt geen aangepaste versies (mods). Download een officile versie.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.host.info:
Ook de [accent]host[] knop hosts een server op poort [scarlet]6567[]. 
Iedereen die verbonden is met dezelfde [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi of lokaal netwerk[] zou je server moeten zien in zijn server lijst.

Als je wil dat personen kunnen verbinden met je server van ergens anders via IP. Dan is [accent]port forwarding[] is nodig.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: Als iemand problemen heeft met het verbinden tot je LAN spel, zorg dan dat mindustry toestemming heeft tot je lokale netwerk in de Firewall instellingen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.join.info: Hier kan je een [accent]server IP[] invullen waarmee je wil verbinden. Je kan hier ook verbinden met servers op je [accent]lokale netwerk[]. LAN en WAN multiplayer wordt ondersteund.\n\n[LIGHT_GRAY]Belangrijk: er is geen automatische globale server lijst; als je met iemand wil verbinden via een IP adres moet je zijn/haar IP adres vragen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.hosts.none: [lightgray]Geen games op je lokale netwerk gevonden.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.invalidid: Ongeldige client ID! Verstuur een bug report!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.delete: Ben je zeker dat je deze sever wil verwijderen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmban: Ben je zeker dat je deze speler wilt verbannen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmkick: Ben je zeker dat je deze speler van de server wilt gooien?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmvotekick: Ben je zeker dat je een stemming wilt starten om deze speler uit de server to gooien?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmunban: Ben je zeker dat je de verbanning wilt opheffen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmadmin: Ben je zeker dat je deze speler administrator wilt maken?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.confirmunadmin: Ben je zeker dat je de administratorstatus van deze speler wilt intrekken?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.joingame.title: Verbinden met server
bundle_nl_BE.properties.disconnect.timeout: Het duurde te lang voordat de server antwoordde.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.cantconnect: Kon niet tot het spel toetreden. ([accent]{0}[]).
bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.error: [crimson]Fout bij het openen van de server: [accent]{0}
bundle_nl_BE.properties.save.overwrite: Ben je zeker dat je deze save\nwilt overschrijven?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.save.delete.confirm: Ben je zeker dat je deze save wil verwijderen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.save.corrupted: [accent]Het savebestand is corrupt of ongeldig.\nAls je zonet je spel geupdatet hebt is dit waarschijnlijk een verandering in de savestructuur en dus[scarlet] geen[] bug.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.data.import.confirm:
Importing external data will erase[scarlet] all[] your current game data.
[accent]This cannot be undone![]

Once the data is imported, your game will exit immediately.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.classic.export.text: [accent]Mindustry[] heeft een grote update gehad.\nClassic (v3.5 build 40) save of map data is teruggevonden. Wil je deze data exporteren naar je de home-folder van je telefoon voor gebruik in de Mindustry-Classic app?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.quit.confirm: Weet je zeker dat je wilt stoppen?
bundle_nl_BE.properties.quit.confirm.tutorial: Ben je zeker dat je nu weet wat je doet?\nDe tutorial kan opnieuw gestart worden via[accent] Instellingen->Spel->Herneem Tutorial.[]
bundle_nl_BE.properties.resumebuilding: [scarlet][[{0}][] om verder te gaan met bouwen
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.delete.confirm: Weet je zeker dat je deze kaart wilt verwijderen? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan gemaakt worden!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.nospawn: Deze map heeft geen cores voor spelers om te spawnen! Voeg een[ROYAL] blauwe[] core toe in de mapbewerker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.nospawn.pvp: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to spawn into! Voeg een[SCARLET] niet-blauwe[] core toe in de mapbewerker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.nospawn.attack: This map does not have any enemy cores for player to attack! Voeg een[SCARLET] rode[] core toe in de mapbewerker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.map.invalid: Fout tijdens het laden van de map: Corrupt of ongeldig mapbestand.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.groundZero.description: The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.frozenForest.description: Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.desertWastes.description:
These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.
Coal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.

[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.saltFlats.description: On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.craters.description: Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.ruinousShores.description: Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.stainedMountains.description:
Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.
Extract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.

The enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.overgrowth.description: This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.tarFields.description:
The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.
Although abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.

[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.desolateRift.description: An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.nuclearComplex.description:
A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.
[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.

The enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.zone.fungalPass.description: A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
